com.vividsolutions.jcs.debug
Class DebugFeature

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.debug.DebugFeature
public class DebugFeature
extends java.lang.Object

Allows capturing features during debugging and outputting them afterwards.

To enable the debugging functions, the Java system property debug must be set to on in the java command line, using the following option: 

     -Ddebug=on
